overview: Join the fun of making music with Justine, Jay, Alex, Abi, Teo and some special guests as Play School takes a journey through a wide range of musical styles, from hip hop to classical.  In each episode, we explore new ways of making and enjoying music through stories and play, and we meet a section of the orchestra.  And of course the toys are there too with a few musical treats of their own.
title: Play School - Making Music
